description: Warner Bros. has announced the movie sequel we all expected, Minecraft 2, with a summer 2027 release date that clashes directly with The Simpsons Movie 2.

description: Invincible VS just announced its eighth playable character, Cecil, and teased its Story Mode. Check out the new gameplay.

description: DC K.O. kicks off a new crossover wherein the Justice League is locked in a martial arts death tournament with the fate of existence at stake. And you'll never guess who loses in Round 1.
title: DC K.O. #1 Reveals Why the Justice League Is Fighting a Death Tournament, and You Won't Believe Who Loses in the First Round

author: Ryan McCaffrey
description: After several Hyrule Warriors: Age of Imprisonment trailers, multiple runs of the hands-on demo at Tokyo Game Show, and probably too much time going over footage frame-by-frame, I’ve come away with seven key changes from Hyrule Warriors: Age of Calamity that you should know before starting in Age of Imprisonment.
title: Hyrule Warriors: Age of Imprisonment – 7 Key Changes From the First Game

author: Chris Reed
description: Four new Batman LEGO sets are up for preorder, to celebrate the release of the video game LEGO Batman: Legacy of the Dark Knight.

description: Borderlands 4 developer Gearbox has given fans a seven day warning: those boss-melting builds based on “unintended interactions” will be nerfed next week.

author: Tom Phillips
description: Bethesda's long-awaited The Elder Scrolls 6 will include a character designed in memory of a much-missed fan, after a remarkable charity campaign that raised more than $85,000 for Make-A-Wish.
title: The Elder Scrolls 6 Will Feature a Memorial Character For a Much-Missed Fan, Following $85,000 Donation to Make-A-Wish

description: HBO Max has released the debut trailer for A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms, which contains plenty of jousting, a fake dragon, and an altogether more light-hearted atmosphere than Game of Thrones.

author: Matt Purslow
description: Crimson Desert's combat system combines fighting game influences with swords, magic, and battle robots. How does that strange mix come together? We spoke to developer Pearl Abyss to find out.

description: The Chair Company review: Tim Robinson earns his place in the HBO pantheon with this new comedy-horror series.

description: Fortnite has re-enabled its now-notorious Peacemaker dance emote, after making changes to its choreography in the wake of speculation it referenced Nazi imagery.

description: Battlefield 6's campaign is a safe, dull reimagining of what the series once was, rather than a bold reinvention of what it could be.

author: Lex Briscuso
description: It’s no joke: we all miss Friends so much. The show has left such a hole in our collective hearts since star Matthew Perry’s untimely death just two years ago — but according to costar Jennifer Aniston, there’s just no way there will ever be a reboot, remake, or even a sequel of the series.
title: 'It Would Be Literally, Physically Impossible' — Friends Star Jennifer Aniston Officially Leaves Rachel Green Behind for Good, Insists There's No Way There Will Ever Be a Reboot, Remake, or Even a Sequel

author: Tom Phillips
description: A special update for Indiana Jones and the Great Circle will add an additional scene to the game's ending, unlocked via New Game Plus.

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Treyarch has confirmed a number of significant changes for Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 Multiplayer that will make it into the game for launch. Chief among them is Open Matchmaking at launch.
title: Call of Duty SBMM Critics Celebrate Victory After Treyarch Confirms Open Matchmaking as the Default for Black Ops 7 Multiplayer at Launch — and Even Persistent Lobbies

author: Chris Reed
description: Don't miss these deals before they're gone.
title: October Prime Day Is Over, But These 11 Deals Are Still Available

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: It is one of the most debated unanswered questions in all video games: how much will Grand Theft Auto 6 cost? Amid the speculation, new research has suggested that a $100 price point would actually earn Rockstar less money than if went for the “sweet spot” of $70.
title: How Much Will GTA 6 Cost? New Research Claims $100 Price Point 'Would Actually Leave Money on The Table'

author: Jim Vejvoda
description: IGN can exclusively reveal the new trailer for Season 2 of the Paramount+ animated series Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles. The new trailer heralds the launch of World of TMNT, an online hub that unites the entire TMNT universe – over 40 years of films, series, games, comics and merchandise – under one shell.
title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles Season 2 Exclusive Trailer

author: Adam Bankhurst
description: IGN can exclusively reveal that Akira Himekawa, the celebrated manga duo behind The Legend of Zelda manga, will make a special appearance at New York Comic Con to participate in a VIZ Industry Panel to discuss their latest mythic adventure, Kamudo, and to hold multiple signings throughout the weekend.
title: The Legend of Zelda Manga's Akira Himekawa to Make Special Appearance at NYCC to Spotlight Kamudo

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Sony tech wizard Mark Cerny has teased new graphics features he's excited to bring to "a future console in a few years time," sparking a wave of PS6 release date speculation in the process.
title: Sony Tech Wizard Mark Cerny Teases New Graphics Features He's Excited to Bring to 'A Future Console in a Few Years' Time,' Sparks Wave of PS6 Release Date Speculation in the Process

author: Tom Phillips
description: Nintendo has at last offered something of an explanation for its mysterious short film project 'Closer to You', which debuted this week and was later revealed as featuring Pikmin.
title: Nintendo Finally Comments on This Week's 'Closer to You' Pikmin Videos, Reveals They're the First Short Films From Nintendo Pictures

description: An excellent beat ‘em up let down by a roguelite structure that doesn’t serve it.

description: Amazon has cut prices on Lexar Play Pro microSD cards again, just a day after its Prime Day discount, dropping the 1TB and 512GB models to their lowest rates of the year for Nintendo Switch 2 storage.

author: Tom Phillips
description: Ubisoft allegedly scrapped early plans for an Assassin's Creed game set during the U.S. post-Civil War period, a report has claimed, with the decision made primarily due to anxiety surrounding the country's current political climate.
title: Assassin's Creed Set During Post-Civil War Period Canceled Last Year Due to Increasing Concerns Over U.S. Political Climate — Report

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Death Stranding and Metal Gear series creator Hideo Kojima recently revealed how repeated visits to the 1970 World Expo (Expo ‘70) as a child had a “life-changing” impact on him, profoundly shaping his outlook as a game developer. In a separate piece, the legendary video game auteur shared how he had a very different experience of the current Expo 2025.
title: Wondering Where Metal Gear Creator Hideo Kojima Got His 'Future-Oriented and Globalized Outlook?' A 'Life-Changing' Expo He Attended in 1970

author: Tom Phillips
description: Fortnite has assembled its largest ever cast of Halloween crossovers in time for the game's latest Fortnitemares celebrations, including Wednesday Addams.
title: Fortnite's Halloween Plans Get Off to Messy Start Following Social Media Snafu Involving Doja Cat and a Sex Toy

author: Adam Bankhurst
description: Walt Disney World has revealed some major Audio-Animatronics updates, including unveiling Zootopia: Better Zoogether!'s Clawhauser figure and announcing that Frozen Ever After's Elsa, Anna, and Kristoff will be updated to feature more realistic faces and no longer use the projection mapping they currently do. Oh, and Disney also shared a Summer 2026 opening window for Rock 'n' Roller Coaster Starring The Muppets!
title: Walt Disney World Reveals Major Audio-Animatronics Updates and Opening Window for Rock 'n' Roller Coaster Starring The Muppets
